titles.title: Modernizing Aeronautical Standards Act
Modernizing Aeronautical Standards Act
To direct the Administrator of the National Aeronautics and Space Administration to conduct a study on the modernization of aeronautical standards, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Science, Space, and Technology.

bill.summary:
Modernizing Aeronautical Standards Act
This bill directs the National Aeronautics and Space Administration (NASA) to conduct a study on the modernization of aeronautical standards, to be known as the Modernization of Aeronautical Standards and Aircraft Performance Study.
